Package com.marginallyclever.artPipeline.loadAndSave

Class LoadAndSaveSVG

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.artPipeline.ImageManipulator
com.marginallyclever.artPipeline.loadAndSave.LoadAndSaveSVG
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoadAndSaveFileType
public class LoadAndSaveSVG
extends ImageManipulator
implements LoadAndSaveFileType
Reads in SVG file and converts it to a temporary gcode file, then calls LoadGCode.
Author:
Dan Royer See https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/paths.html
